fields.Name: GetConversationArtifactsMap
fields.UserQuestion: What artifacts are linked to messages in this conversation?
fields.Description: Returns a lightweight map of all artifacts linked to conversation messages, without loading full content. Optimized for quick display with lazy-loading support.
fields.TechnicalDescription: Joins ConversationDetailArtifacts, ArtifactVersions, and Artifacts tables to return basic artifact metadata for a conversation. Returns display-ready data (name, type, version number) without expensive Content field. Supports lazy-loading pattern where full entities are loaded on-demand when user clicks on an artifact. Single query replaces 3 separate sequential queries for ~70% performance improvement.
